```{r}
library(readr)
library(ggplot2)

s01_dat <- read_csv(
  "https://lin611-2024.github.io/notes/meetings/data/s01_dat.csv"
) 
```

```{r}
s01_dat |> 
  norm_wattfab(
    f1:f2,
    .by = speaker,
    .vowel_col = plt_vclass,
    .high_front = c("iy"),
    .low = c("ae")
  ) |> 
  ggplot(
    aes(f2_wf, f1_wf)
  )+
  geom_point() +
  coord_fixed()+
  scale_y_reverse()+
  scale_x_reverse()
```

```{r}
length(tidyselect::eval_select(foo, s01_dat))
```

```{r}
stringr::str_extract(
      "f1", 
      r"{[fF](\d)}",
      group = 1
    )
```

```{r}
s01_dat |> 
  mutate(
    across(
      f1:f3,
      .fns = \(x) mean(x, na.rm = T)
    )
  )
```

```{r}
library(tidyselect)
```

```{r}
expr <- rlang::expr(starts_with("f"))
expr
```

```{r}
pos <- eval_select(expr, data = s01_dat)

glue::glue(
  "{x}_L",  x = names(pos)
)
```
